The '''Maison Gestion''' is a governmental organization responsible for document management and handling administrative tasks within the [[Court of Fontaine]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Tales From the Court}}</ref><ref>{{Ref/Quest|A Certain Notice}}</ref> It is based at the [[Palais Mermonia]].

==Overview==
The Maison Gestion is subdivided into various offices, such as those responsible for confidential items and for matters regarding staff.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|A Certain Notice}}</ref> Like many governments, it suffers from bureaucratic overcomplication, such that even replacing a single missing keycap requires multiple rounds of paperwork and approvals.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|A Certain Stamp}}</ref> In another case, [[Livre]] had to rely on police intervention to obtain payment from the Palais Mermonia for an order of [[Clockwork Meka]], since the only Gestionnaire who could help repeatedly turned him away on account of minute issues (e.g., running out of stamp pad ink). According to [[Caron]], this type of problem occurs often.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Tales From the Court}}</ref>

==Gestionnaires==
Employees of the Maison Gestion are called 'Gestionnaires'.
